Class InstructorHomePage

java.lang.Object
main.InstructorHomePage
public class InstructorHomePage extends Object
InstructorHomePage class represents the home page for users with the instructor role.

      Parameters:
      reportId - The ID of the report
      status - The new status (reviewed or dismissed)
